reviewText: To all of the imbeciles out there giving these DVDs 1-star reviews, shame on you.  You'd think the French writing on the box would be a clue.  Don't make French-speakers pass up even looking at these DVDs just because YOU didn't pay enough attention.

VERY VERY Disappointing. States that it is in english when it's not.
NOT NOT NOT HAPPY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
